main event: A witness in New Milford, Connecticut reported observing an unidentified flying object moving across the sky on July 3, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed moving slowly from the southern horizon to the northern horizon for approximately 15 minutes, and then appeared to reverse course and descend rapidly overhead.
The object became brighter as it rose in the sky.
Another witness in New Milford also reported observing an unidentified object in the sky.
The Air Force requested that the witnesses complete a Form 164 to report the sighting in more detail.
The Air Force's Project Blue Book was unable to evaluate the report due to insufficient data and planned to evaluate it at a later date.
photographs: no, the report indicates that no photographs were included
